From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Dracona fixed Gangon's comm system and called BrightBlade on it.

"This is Dracona of the Maximals, I am standing out in the field, come to my
coordiantes if you ever want to see Gangon ever again!" Dracona said, flying
out into the field with Gangon in tow. She set him down.

"Okay, I'll have to tie you up for this one." Dracona said. Gangon eagerly
obliged and let Dracona tie him up. Dracona sent the cooridinates to
BrightBlade and waited...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 7:52 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> BrightBlade/ Rage
>
> BrightBlade sighed as she walked through the halls of the Predacon ship,
> there was absolutly JACK to do.
> Where was all the fun? Where was all the glory? Where was all the Maximals
> to slag?!
> She looked down halls as she passed them, thinking about how she'd like
> Gangon to be walking beside her. She smiled at that thought. Him with all
> his comments about her pretty he thought she was, his crazy antics that
made
> her laugh on the inside but she never showed.
> He was a funny bot...but she had grown to like him...even a bit more then
> she let on.
> In plain...you could ALMOST say that she loved him.
> BrightBlade sighed again, but with him not with her at the moment she was
> still bored out of her tree!
> Well, she could always ask if Hell Beast had anything he wanted her to do.
> She opened her com-link to his frequency.
>
> " This is BrightBlade. Is there anything in which you require me to do for
> you, My Lord?"
>
> She quietly waited for a responce.
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> Rage growled as she looked between the trees and spoted the enemy ship,
the
> huge metal thing in which stank of steel!
> She looked it over from her vantage point, how strange and ugly it was!
> She then saw something walk out of it, it was another of those raptor
> things! The things that tastes just as bad as the things they lived in
> smelled!
> Rage shook her head at remembering the taste, something she never wanted
to
> sink her teeth into again!
> She stayed where she was and watched, there was no point in giving away
her
> position when she didn't want to.
>
>
>
